glsa.title: libSRTP: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in libSRTP can result in a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: libSRTP is an Open-source implementation of the Secure Real-time Transport Protocol.

description.p: A flaw was found in how the crypto_policy_set_from_profile_for_rtp() function applies cryptographic profiles to an srtp_policy in libSRTP.

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash an application linked against libSRTP, resulting in Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libSRTP users should upgrade to the latest version:
